function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Questioning the use of the balcony in apartments during the COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Uncertainty and anxiety among residents, potential increase in close contact and transmission of the virus","Mitigation":"Encouraging clear communication and guidelines for balcony use, promoting social distancing and mask-wearing","Technologies":"None specified","People":"Apartment residents, building management","Owner":"Building management, public health authorities"}]}
